meanings.definition: A message delivered by a person dressed in a costume who kisses the recipient.
meanings.sent1: The children at the party were surprised by the funny kissograms.
meanings.sent2: She received a lovely kissogram from her secret admirer.
meanings.sent3: The kissograms at the event made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His kissogram was like a sweet surprise in the midst of the party.
meanings.sent5: The kissogram delivery person wore a colorful costume and brought joy to the celebration.

meanings.definition: The act of sending a message through a person who delivers a kiss.
meanings.sent1: Sending kissograms is a unique way to express feelings.
meanings.sent2: He decided to send a kissogram to his long-distance girlfriend.
meanings.sent3: The kissograms service made communication more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her kissogram was a heartfelt way to show her affection.
meanings.sent5: The kissogram delivery added a personal touch to the message.
